gawk
====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which gawk installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using gawk, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load gawk/5.3.0-GCC-12.3.0
```
